mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.useable_disease_class_id AS "useableDiseaseClassId", a.disease_code AS "diseaseCode", a.disease_name AS "diseaseName", a.disease_detial AS "diseaseDetial", a.disease_create_user AS "diseaseCreateUser", a.yisi AS "yisi", a.linchuang AS "linchuang"
